charm.name: Adrenaline Burst
charm.description: Bursts of adrenaline enhance your reflexes with a certain chance after you get hit and let you move faster for 10 seconds.

charm.name: Cripple
charm.description: Cripples the creature with a certain chance and paralyses it for 10 seconds.

charm.name: Numb
charm.description: Numbs the creature with a certain chance after its attack and paralyses the creature for 10 seconds.

charm.name: Dodge
charm.description: Dodges and ttack with a certain chance without taking any damage at all.

charm.name: Poison
charm.description: Triggers on a creature with a certain chance and deals 5% of its initial hit points as earth damage once.

charm.name: Wound
charm.description: Triggers on a creature with a certain chance and deals 5% of its initial hit points as physical damage once.

charm.name: Cleanse
charm.description: Cleanses you from within with a certain chance after you get hit and removes one random active negative status effect and temporarily makes you immune against it.

charm.name: Freeze
charm.description: Triggers on a creature with a certain chance and deals 5% of its initial hit points as ice damage once.

charm.name: Zap
charm.description: Triggers on a creature with a certain chance and deals 5% of its initial hit points as energy damage once.

charm.name: Curse
charm.description: Triggers on a creature with a certain chance and deals 5% of its initial hit points as death damage once.

charm.name: Enflame
charm.description: Triggers on a creature with a certain chance and deals 5% of its initial hit points as fire damage once.

charm.name: Parry
charm.description: Any damage taken is reflected to the aggressor with a certain chance.

charm.name: Scavenge
charm.description: Enhances your chances to successfully skin/dust a skinnable/dustable creature.

charm.name: Bless
charm.description: Blesses you and reduces skill and experience loss by 3% when killed by the chosen creature.

charm.name: Gut
charm.description: Gutting the creature yields 10% more creature products.

charm.name: Low Blow
charm.description: Adds 3% critical hit chance to attacks with critical hit weapons.
